column2: "Na ɔbarimba bi a ne dzin dze Ananias nye ne yer Safira kɔtɔɔn asaase bi
column4: "na ɔdze ne tsisika bi siei
column5: nna ne yer so nyim ho bi
column6: na ɔdze fa bi bae bɔtoo asomafo no ananadze."

column2: "Na Peter see dɛ
column3: Ananias
column4: ɔyɛ dɛn na Satan ahyɛ w'akoma ma dɛ ibedzi ator akyerɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no
column5: na edze asaase no ne tsisika no bi esuma?"

column2: "Ana ɔwɔ hɔ no
column3: nnyɛ wankasa wodze bi a? Na wɔtɔnee no
column4: onnyi wankasa wo nsamu bi? Ɔyɛ dɛn na adwen adze yi wɔ w'akoma mu? Nnyɛ nyimpa na edzi ator akyerɛ hɔn

column2: "Na Ananias tsee nsɛm yi no
column3: otwae hwee famu wui
column4: na hu kɛse kaa hɔn a wɔtsee yinom nyina."

column2: "Na mberantsɛ no soɛree kyekyeer no ho
column3: na wɔdze no kɔree kesiee no."

column2: "Na n'ekyir bɛyɛ ndɔnhwer ebiasa
column3: na ne yer a onnyim dza esi no so bae."

column2: "Na Peter see no dɛ
column3: Ka kyerɛ me
column4: ana hom tɔɔn asaase no gyee dɛmara? Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na Peter see no dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom ayɛ kor dɛ hom robɔsɔ Ewuradze Sunsum no ahwɛ yi? Hwɛ
column4: hɔn a wokesiee wo kun no anan wɔ abowano
column5: na wɔbɔsoa wo so akɔ dɛmara."

column2: "Na ɔhwee n'ananadze amonmu hɔ ara wui; na mberantsɛ no bae bohun dɛ oewu no
column3: wɔsoaa no kɔree kesiee no no kun nkyɛn."

column2: "Na hu kɛse baa asɔr mu no nyina
column3: nye dodow a wɔtsee yinom nyina do."

column2: "Na wɔnam asomafo no nsa do na wɔyɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze pii wɔ ɔman no mu
column3: na hɔn nyina yɛɛ adwenkor wɔ Solomon abrandaa mu."

column2: "Na nkaa no mu obiara ennsi no bo dɛ ɔdze noho bɔ hɔn ho
column3: na ɔman no dze
column4: wɔkamfoo hɔn."

column2: "Na dodow bɛkaa hɔn ho a wɔgyee Ewuradze dzii
column3: mbarimba nye mbaa pii
column5: "ma wɔsoaa ayarfo fiir edzi baa abrɔn mu so bɔtotoo mpikyi nye nkɛtɛ do
column6: ama Peter resen a no sunsuma aakata hɔn mu bi do."

column2: "Na nkurow a oetwa ho ehyia no mu nyimpadodow so dze ayarfo nye hɔn a esunsum fi rehyɛ hɔn amen baa Jerusalɛm
column3: na wɔyɛɛ hɔn nyina edur."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfopanyin nye hɔn a wɔka no ho a wofi Sadusiifo fɛkuw no soɛree
column3: na nyinkun hyɛɛ hɔn ma
column5: "na wɔdze hɔn nsa suoo asomafo no mu
column6: na wɔdze hɔn koguu kwasafo efiadze."

column2: "Na Ewuradze bɔfoe bobuee efiadze no no mbobow no na ɔdze hɔn puei
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: "Hom nkɔ nkegyina asɔrfi no mu nkɛka dɛm Nkwa yi ne nsɛm nyina nkyerɛ ɔman no."

column2: "Na wɔtsee no
column3: wɔkɔr asɔrfi no mu anapaatu kɛkyerɛkyerɛe. Na ɔsɔfopanyin no nye hɔn a wɔka no ho no bae
column4: na wɔbɛfrɛɛ baguafo nye Israelmba mpanyimfo nyina boaa ano
column5: na wɔsomae kɔr efiadze hɔ dɛ wɔnkɛfa hɔn mbra."

column2: "Na asomfo no kɔr hɔ na woennhu hɔn efiadze hɔ no
column3: wɔsanee bɛkaa dɛ
column6: yekohun dɛ wɔatow mu yie pɛpɛɛpɛr
column7: na ahwɛfo no gyina ekyir wɔ abowano
column8: naaso yebuei no yeennhu obiara wɔ mu."

column2: "Na asɔrfi safohen no nye asɔfompanyin no tsee nsɛm yi no
column3: hɔn tsirmu yɛɛ hɔn konsee wɔ ho dɛ
column4: na ebɛn asɛm nye yi?"

column2: "Na obi bae bɛkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: mbarimba no a hom dze hɔn guu efiadze no gyina asɔrfi no mu rekyerɛkyerɛ ɔman no."

column2: "Nna safohen no nye asomfo no kɔree kɛfaa hɔn bae
column3: nnyɛ akataban do bi a
column4: osiandɛ wosuroo ɔman no

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn bae no
column3: wɔdze hɔn begyinaa bagua mu
column4: na ɔsɔfopanyin no bisaa hɔn dɛ
column6: "Yɛbraa hom ketsee dɛ mma hom nnkyerɛkyerɛ wɔ dɛm dzin yi mu; na hwɛ
column7: hom dze hom nkyerɛkyerɛ ahyɛ Jerusalɛm nyina ma
column8: na hom pɛ dɛ hom dze nyimpa yi no bɔgyaa ba hɛn do."

column2: "Na Peter nye asomafo no buae see dɛ
column3: Otwar dɛ yetsie Nyankopɔn asɛm mbom kyɛn nyimpa dze."

column2: "Hɛn egyanom Nyankopɔn nyaan Jesus a hom sɛɛn no dua do kum no no."
"Ɔno na Nyankopɔn dze ne nsa nyimfa maa no do dɛ Safohen nye Agyenkwa
column3: dɛ ɔmma Israel nnuho nye bɔnfakyɛ."

column2: "Na hɛn yɛyɛ nsɛm yi ho adasefo
column3: dɛmara so na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no a Nyankopɔn dze ama hɔn a wotsie no no yɛ."

column2: "Na hɔn dze wɔtsee yi no
column3: hɔn akoma mu twitwaa hɔn
column4: na wɔkɔr apam dɛ woboku hɔn."

column2: "Na baguafo no mu baako a ɔyɛ Farisiinyi a ne dzin dze Gamaliel a ɔyɛ mbrakyerɛfo a ɔman no nyina buu no bi no soɛree
column3: na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa nyimpa no mfir edzi kakra."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Israel mbarimba
column4: hom nhwɛ hom ho yie wɔ nyimpa yi ho

column2: "Na ansaana mber yi rebɛba no
column3: na Teudas a ɔhyehyɛɛ noho dɛ ɔyɛ obi soɛree
column4: na mbarimba a hɔn dodow bɛyɛ dɛ ahaanan dze hɔnho kɔbɔɔ no ho; ɔno na wokum no
column5: na hɔn a wotsiee no nyina hwetsee

column2: "Na oyi ekyir
column3: Judas Galiliinyi soɛɛr ɔkankyerɛw nda no mu
column4: na ɔtwee binom pii dzii n'ekyir; na ɔno so wui
column5: na hɔn a wotsiee no nyina bɔɔ apetse."

column2: "Na afei mese hom dɛ
column3: Hom ntwe hom ho mfi nyimpa yi ho
column4: na hom ngyaa hɔn: na sɛ apam yi anaa edwuma yi fir nyimpa mu a

column2: "na sɛ ofir Nyankopɔn a
column3: hom runntum mmbutuw no
column4: amma hom aammbɛyɛ dɛ hom nye Nyankopɔn mpo roko."

column2: "Na wotsiee no na wɔfrɛɛ asomafo no bae
column3: na wɔhwee hɔn na wɔbraa hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnkasa wɔ Jesus dzin mu
column4: na wogyaa hɔn."

column2: "Na hɔn dze
column3: wɔdze dɛw fii baguafo no enyim hɔ kɔree
column4: dɛ woebu hɔn bi dɛ wɔsɛ dɛ wɔbɔ hɔn adapaa wɔ Dzin no ntsi."

column2: "Na woenngyaa dɛ daa nyina wɔ asɔrfi mu nye efiefie no
column3: wɔkyerɛkyerɛ na wɔka asɛmpa wɔ Jesus ho
column4: dɛ ɔno nye Kraest no."
